channel.title: Is there a server that
channel.description: Idk if this is the right place to post this, but does anyone know of a rsps that is not pk based(has an economey, xp) but is open word pvp? I was loved the idea of this and even have learned rs was originally this way, does anyone know of a server like this?

item.title: Is there a server that
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

There’s probably a few laying around somewhere. It’s better to find some tutorials and make a decent source into it though. Also, I’m not too sure how many would like this idea, mostly since if you tried to do anything outside of safezones, you would get fucked by whatever asshole wants to kill you for no reason.

Read full topic
